title: Adding sequential numbers
description: Add sequential numbering to the first column of a table for better navigation and row referencing.

title: Commenting spreadsheet errors
description: Script checks for formula errors like “#DIV/0!” in cells and adds comments to each error.

title: Creating formatted table
description: Formats a table during creation: adds borders, fills headers, aligns text in cells.

title: Creating spreadsheet chart
description: Creates a custom chart filled with array-based values in a spreadsheet.

title: Creating spreadsheet with different cell types
description: Creates a spreadsheet with heterogeneous data types for working with tables containing text, dates, amounts, percentages, and ratings.

title: Creating spreadsheet with filters
description: Creates a spreadsheet with interactive filters in the header row that allows users to sort and filter data conveniently.

title: Filling spreadsheet
description: Fill an empty spreadsheet with data stored in arrays.

title: Inserting formulas
description: Add formulas to cells for calculations like sum, average, and count.
